title: Herbalife Releases Second Global Sustainability Report :: Herbalife Ltd. (HLF) - Investor Relations :: Herbalife Ltd. (HLF)
summary: Herbalife released its second Global Sustainability Report emphasizing its commitment to sustainability across product, people, and the planet, aligning with stakeholder priorities and the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. The report highlights achievements in areas such as quality product launches, support for healthy people initiatives, and efforts towards a thriving planet through sustainable practices.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325411 - Medicinal and Botanical Manufacturing, 325412 - Pharmaceutical Preparation Manufacturing, 325620 - Toilet Preparation Manufacturing, 624210 - Community Food Services

title: East Penn Manufacturing power a closed loop circular economy - Sustainability Magazine
summary: East Penn Manufacturing is a leading battery manufacturer known for sustainability in production. The company emphasizes recycling and reusing materials like lead, plastic, and acid in batteries. It invests in employee well-being and renewable energy sources, garnering recognition for its environmental efforts.
green_innovation: TRUE - The article highlights how East Penn Manufacturing focuses on sustainability in its operations by recycling and reusing materials in its production process, investing in renewable energy, and winning awards for its environmental stewardship.
business_innovation: FALSE - The article focuses more on sustainability and recycling efforts rather than introducing new or significantly improved products or business processes.
green_product: TRUE - The article discusses how East Penn Manufacturing's batteries are designed and manufactured to significantly reduce their environmental impact throughout their life cycle by using recycled materials, supporting a circular economy, and promoting sustainability.
green_process: TRUE - The article emphasizes East Penn Manufacturing's green processes such as recycling and reusing all major parts of lead batteries, committing to renewable energy sources, and operating in a closed-loop manufacturing process.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335911 - Storage Battery Manufacturing, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 551112 - Offices of Other Holding Companies, 551114 - Corporate, Subsidiary, and Regional Managing Offices
greenwashing: FALSE - The article does not display characteristics of greenwashing as it genuinely showcases East Penn Manufacturing's efforts towards sustainability and environmental stewardship.
